pr_title: Format support for script doc fields

timeline.message:
format support for script doc fields

Adds `format` and `locale` support to `runtime_script` fields,
specifically those with the `runtime_type` of `date`. Others
`runtime_type`s will return an error if provided with those parameters.

timeline.bodyText: nit: I think that looking at this error message, there is a slight change that it makes users think that the specific value they provided for the format parameter is not supported, more than providing any format. same for locale. Maybe we can rephrase it?
timeline.author: javanna

timeline.bodyText: would it make sense to have some duel tests between concrete dates and runtime dates to make sure that formatting and locale are applied the same way?
timeline.author: javanna
